name: Ralf (itch)
description:
This Game was created for the "One Game a week" Seminar of the "University of Europe for Applied Sciences" in Hamburg. 

Theme: One Button

Description:

Press "Space" to jump and hold "Space" to jump even higher in order to help Ralf to avoid colliding with objects and beat the HighScore!

Music Asset: BGM_01- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-game-bgm-5-135943
